testimonial1.text: I have been working with Laguna Dent Lab for 5 years. The quality of their prosthetics has been exceptional and the personalized attention has made the difference in my patients' satisfaction.
testimonial1.author: Dr. Mario González
testimonial1.title: General Dentist

testimonial2.text: Their precision in every job and delivery times are exceptional. They have helped me tremendously in complex rehabilitation cases. Highly recommended.
testimonial2.author: Dr. Carlos Hernández
testimonial2.title: Rehabilitation Specialist

cta.title: Ready to work with us?
cta.subtitle: Join the hundreds of dentists who trust our work and service

question1.title: How long does an average job take?
question1.answer: Delivery time depends on the type of prosthesis. On average, jobs like crowns take 3 to 5 business days, while complete prostheses may require 7 to 10 business days.

question2.title: What materials do you use?
question2.answer: We work with premium materials: high-translucency zirconia, porcelains, medical-grade acrylics, and certified biocompatible alloys. All our materials comply with international quality standards.

question3.title: Do I need to schedule an appointment to pick up a job?
question3.answer: It's not strictly necessary, but it's recommended to schedule an appointment to ensure your work is ready and that one of our technicians can personally assist you. Our business hours are Monday to Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM and Saturdays from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: 15 years of experience creating perfect smiles

history.title: Our History
history.description: Laguna Dent Lab emerged from the need to deliver better quality prosthetics to patients, as there weren't many options in the market that could satisfy this need. Due to this problem, we decided to start the laboratory. Along the way we have encountered various complications, but we have been resolving them and at this point, we feel satisfied with the work we have achieved and every day we are advancing further on this path.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To offer personalized dental solutions through the manufacturing of high-quality pieces, plates and prosthetics, using reliable materials, precise processes and specialized technology. Our commitment is to support dentists and specialists to improve the functionality, aesthetics and quality of life of their patients, always maintaining responsible, ethical and efficient service.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the reference dental laboratory in the region, recognized for quality, precision and innovation in the elaboration of dental pieces, plates and prosthetics, contributing to patient well-being and confidence through collaborative work with dental health professionals.

member.name: Dr. Saúl Rubén Ramírez Mora
member.description: Dr. Saúl Rubén Ramírez Mora is the manager and owner of the laboratory, in addition to having his own dental office. He is a Dental Surgeon graduated from the Faculty of Dentistry of the Autonomous University of Coahuila and is currently pursuing a master's degree in dental implantology. With 15 years of experience in the dental field and 4 years leading the laboratory, he is distinguished by his constant professional updating and for promoting the training of his team, with the objective of always providing the highest quality care.
